entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
